hero.title: Skip the back-and-forth. Hit the court.

shareAnywhere.title: Share anywhere
shareAnywhere.description: Drop it in any group chat, email, or social feed.

skillHints.BEGINNER: New to intermediate players learning fundamentals
skillHints.INTERMEDIATE: Consistent players with developed strokes and strategy
skillHints.ADVANCED: Elite players with tournament experience and advanced skills

ntrp.description: The National Tennis Rating Program (NTRP) helps match players of similar skill levels.

levels.1.0: 1.0 - New Player: Just starting to learn tennis
levels.1.5: 1.5 - Beginner: Limited experience, working on getting ball in play
levels.2.0: 2.0 - Novice: Needs court experience, obvious stroke weaknesses
levels.2.5: 2.5 - Advanced Novice: Learning ball judgment, can sustain slow rallies
levels.3.0: 3.0 - Intermediate: Fairly consistent on medium-paced shots
levels.3.5: 3.5 - Advanced Intermediate: Improved stroke dependability with directional control
levels.4.0: 4.0 - Advanced: Dependable strokes with depth and directional control
levels.4.5: 4.5 - Expert: Beginning to master power and spins, sound footwork
levels.5.0: 5.0 - Elite: Good shot anticipation, can structure game around strengths
levels.5.5: 5.5 - Elite+: Developed power/consistency as major weapon
